# Changelog

## 1.0.4

- Fix IE9 compatibility.

## 1.0.3

- Further improvements to caching.

## 1.0.2

- Fix overaggressive caching that would prevent `tabbable` from knowing an element's children had changed.

## 1.0.1

- Fix handling of `<a>` elements with `tabindex="0"`.

## 1.0.0

- Initial release.
